headline: Motorola Solutions Voted #1 Best Workplace for Innovators by Fast Company
summary: CHICAGO, September 22, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced it has been voted #1 by Fast Company for "Best Workplaces for Innovators." Motorola Solutions was selected for its leadership in developing purpose-built AI that automates tasks and augments human attention, helping people detect, respond, verify and resolve safety and security threats.
